articles.title: Trey Mullinax overcomes mad dash to get to Scotland, bent clubs to play Open Championship
articles.description: Trey Mullinax needed a hectic travel plan just to get to Scotland only to discover his clubs were bent, but has since made a move up the Open Championship leaderboard.
articles.content: ST. ANDREWS, Scotland -- Trey Mullinax had a mad rush to get to Scotland in time for the 150th Open and had to contend with bent golf clubs from the journey, but still managed to make the cut and car… [+2473 chars]

articles.title: Houston Astros' Jose Altuve out of All-Star Game, Cleveland Guardian's Andres Giménez to start at 2B
articles.description: Houston Astros star Jose Altuve will not play in Tuesday's All-Star Game and will be replaced by Cleveland's Andrés Giménez at second base.
articles.content: CLEVELAND -- Houston second baseman Jose Altuve won't play in Tuesday's All-Star Game after being hit by a pitch and will be replaced by Cleveland's Andrés Giménez, who will now start in his first ap… [+771 chars]

articles.title: Sources - Washington Nationals open to listening to Juan Soto trade offers after $440M contract rejected
articles.description: The Nationals are willing to listen to trade offers for Juan Soto after the star outfielder rejected a 15-year, $440 million contract offer, league sources confirmed to ESPN.
articles.content:
The Washington Nationals are willing to listen to trade offers for Juan Soto after the star outfielder rejected their most recent long-term offer, league sources confirmed to ESPN on Saturday.

articles.description: How many of this year's All-Stars are Hall of Fame-bound? We break down every player's chances into tiers from the no-doubters to the longest of long shots.

articles.title: San Antonio Spurs' Keldon Johnson agrees to 4-year, $80M extension
articles.description: The San Antonio Spurs and forward Keldon Johnson reached agreement on a four-year extension worth $80 million on Friday night.
articles.content:
The San Antonio Spurs and forward Keldon Johnson have agreed to a four-year, $80 million extension, his representative Klutch Sports Agency announced Friday night.

Los Angeles Lakers star Russell Westbrook and his longtime agent, Thad Foucher of Wasserman, have parted ways, Foucher told ESPN on Friday night.

articles.title: Allyson Felix caps final appearance at track world championships with bronze medal in 4x400m mixed relay
articles.description: Allyson Felix won her 19th and final medal in the world championships Friday night -- a bronze she took after running the second leg of America's 4x400-meters in the mixed relay that's been touted as the last major race of the 36-year-old's career.

articles.title: Miami Dolphins' Jason McCourty retires after 13 NFL seasons
articles.description: Jason McCourty, who played for the winless Browns in 2017 and then won a Super Bowl with the Patriots the following season alongside his twin brother, Devin, has retired after a 13-year career that also included stops with the Titans and Dolphins.
